snippet: At least one elementary truth about the war is re-established this morning with the first complete publication in this country of the French Yellow Book, the official selection of the diplomatic reports that poured into Paris, and into French Emba...
lead_paragraph: At least one elementary truth about the war is re-established this morning with the first complete publication in this country of the French Yellow Book, the official selection of the diplomatic reports that poured into Paris, and into French Embassies, during the pre-war period. The documents do not, of course, cover all the ground; and it is a pity, ...
